lead_paragraph: Ireland flyhalf Johnny Sexton and fellow backs Dave Kearney, Rob Kearney and Luke Fitzgerald have been ruled out of this month's three-test series in South Africa through injury, the Irish Rugby Football Union said on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Sexton Out of Irish Tour to South Africa as Injuries Mount
headline.main: Sexton Out of Irish Tour to South Africa as Injuries Mount

snippet: Ireland flyhalf Johnny Sexton and fellow backs Dave Kearney, Rob Kearney and Luke Fitzgerald have been ruled out of this month's three-test series in South Africa through injury, the Irish Rugby Football Union said on Thursday....
